MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's been a few days since the monstrous event that caused Verona's performance to deviate so much from her own intentions, but she's still not back to normal.

Just a few minutes ago, I was dragged to the student dormitory by Vivienne,
who looked panicked and said there was trouble...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, it's useless. If I can't act, there's no point in living.
I'm a little bird with my wings ripped off~♪ Moo~♪
Verona is staggering ostentatiously as if it is a scene from a play, and then puts her upraised fingers along the left and right sides of her head and moos.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, it's so hard to see Verona turn out like this when she's such a good actress. That's not a little bird, that's a cow.
The cause is a large mirror that Vivienne had bought at a thrift store.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's a big mirror that reflects the whole body.
Verona loves fashion, too, so I thought she'd like it.

However, when Verona saw her reflection in the mirror,
she realized that her performance was out of sync.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...I'm all washed up.

That's not true.
Even if your acting is a little off, you're still you.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No. For me, acting was everything. If I can't act, then all I'm left with is a cowardly, helpless Verona... Achoo!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What do I do? It's all my fault...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Don't worry, it was meant to happen one day...
Oh, Vivienne! Don't move! Just stay where you are!

As soon as she turns her gaze towards Vivienne,
Verona's face changes color and she stands up.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? What's up with you all of a sudden?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: T-there's a big spider...

Verona shakily points to where, on Vivienne's shoulder,
a poisonous-looking spider as big as the palm of her hand is crawling.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow, I didn't notice it at all. I'm pretty sure it's one with strong poison. It's rare to see one in a city like this.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Vivienne, you can't take your time like that.
It looked at me! I'm not very good with spiders. Oh no!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
With a bow, I have one shot.
It's a tossup between me shaking off the spider or the spider biting me first.

Vivienne says under her breath. A remote attack like a bow or magic might be able to knock it off before it bites. But Vivienne can't shoot herself in the shoulder, and Verona, who can use magic, hasn't recovered from her illness yet.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I've got to do something...

Unable to move for fear of irritating the spider,
Verona grabs her staff with trembling hands and raises it slowly.
Can you do it?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Can I do it? I have no choice but to do it.
It's my mission to deliver fresh vegetables to all the citizens.

One or two carrots appear around Verona's staff.
This is no good, she's still acting like a vegetable vendor at the morning market.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Don't move, little girl. Come on, it's a big day!
Take as much as you want!

At the same time Verona swings her staff down,
a carrot that had been floating in the air glides without a sound.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hyaah!
Without a second thought, Vivienne closes her eyes. With exquisite control, the carrot knocks the spider down to the floor, and it stands there, trapped as if it were a prison.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Verona, wow! Thank you so much for helping me!

When Verona successfully kills the spider,
she blows on the end of her staff like a sniper after a job well done, and speaks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Thank you for your purchase. Achoo!

Verona is strong. No matter what kind of person she is playing,
she has the strength to accomplish anything by her own will.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Wow, I lost again!
Why can't I beat "guy who makes candy bars"?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's because I feel an incomparable joy in making candy bars. And I believe from the bottom of my heart that I can save the world by continuing to make them~♪ La la~♪
Verona is no longer out of tune. She's playing the role of a man who makes candy. There are some doubts about the setting of the character, but that's not important.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Even so, the fact that I couldn't act because of a cold
made me realize how important it is for an actress to take care of her health.
It turned out later that when some people catch a cold, they get a rare symptom of distorted sound, and Verona has it. Her cold has gone away and she's fine now.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm the one playing the role. There's only one thing to do, no matter what role I'm playing, as long as I remember to lift the Mist from the world.

It was that feeling that saved Vivienne.
And, it will eventually save the world.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hey, Conductor. I'm not so sure about that now, but someday,
when the world is free of Mist...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Verona
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Then watch me playing nothing.

She whispers in my ear
and then I stare stunned for a while at Verona as she dances away.

I can't wait to see what the future holds for this masterful writer
and actress who is the pride and joy of the SSS.
